message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it a bit more even. This is my final offer.
Come on, meet me in the middle
Time is running out!  This is a very fair deal.
You're running out of time, not me
Okay, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
Your 50/50 was a good try, but I'm not buying it
This is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a compromise - 48/52.  Let's end this before we both lose out.
